title: Full Stack with PHP
description: Full-stack web development refers to web development taking place in both the front and back ends of a website. Full stack web developers have the ability to design complete web applications and websites. They are proficient in both frontend and backend languages and frameworks, as well as in server, network and hosting environments.
objectives: 1. You will start your way in Web Development world by a very powerful and easy techniques.
2. In this course you will gain the fundamental and basic concepts of Front-end web development, you will have fundamental knowledge of HTML/CSS syntax.
3. You will start your way in Back-end Web Development world by a very powerful and easy techniques
4. In this course you will gain the fundamental and basic concepts of Back-end web development, you will have fundamental knowledge of PHP syntax.
requirements: You donâ€™t need any skill or any previous experience!
content: 1. Basic setup and learning how to learn
2. Web standards and best practices (such as accessibility and cross-browser compatibility)
3. HTML, the language that gives web content structure and meaning
4. CSS, the language used to style web pages
